onset.Description: Start time of the event, in seconds.

duration.Description: Duration of the event (required in BIDS but not a part of the EEG.event structure; therefore consists of 0 values

sample.Description: Sample point of the event in data points, relative to the start of the EEG recording.

value.Description: The code used to indicate an event marker.

Levels.11: Target (for that block) A, stimulus type A
Levels.21: Target (for that block) B, stimulus type A
Levels.31: Target (for that block) C, stimulus type A
Levels.41: Target (for that block) D, stimulus type A
Levels.51: Target (for that block) E, stimulus type A

Levels.32: Target (for that block) C, stimulus type B
Levels.42: Target (for that block) D, stimulus type B
Levels.52: Target (for that block) E, stimulus type B

Levels.23: Target (for that block) B, stimulus type C
Levels.33: Target (for that block) C, stimulus type C
Levels.43: Target (for that block) D, stimulus type C
Levels.53: Target (for that block) E, stimulus type C
